name: Rara's Run Escapade
description:
Short Story
A 2d platform game that tells the story of Rara the last dark mage who is in search for the ritual of life that will bring his entire clan alive. It's like temple run.

GGJ16 Theme: Ritual
Location: Microsoft Makati

Team Dn'D(DragN'Edit)
Programmer: Apollo(me)
Character & Environment Artists: Herald & Bryle
Layout Artist: Richard
Support: JM & Arman

Software Used: 
Unity 2018.3.0f2 (Unity 5.0 and Up  - first version of the game) 
Paint Tool Sai
Adobe Photoshop CS6

GGJ2016
